Html:
i have downloded the richtexteditor but what are the steps to use the editor is not known to me, so kindly tell me about that.

where to save the dll.  where to save the unzip file and all that.

Hello

You don't really "install" the control per say. You only need to reference the dll into your project file.
If you want the drag/drop functionality of normal .net controls you can add this to any tool bar.

 

Medmerd
